title: Wheels - Check For Damage

body.body: Wheels - Check For Damage
Warning - General - Stabilise Motorcycle - including DO NOT support on non integral parts
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall resulting in motorcycle damage, serious injury or death.
Check the wheel rims for dents or deformation.
Operation with damaged or defective wheels is dangerous and loss of motorcycle control or an accident could result.
Always consult your authorised Triumph dealer for a safety inspection of the wheels, or for wheel replacement.

Alloy wheels - CF7 [Tiger 900 GT Aragon Edition]; CM7 [Tiger 900 GT]; CR7 [Tiger 900 GT Pro]; CT7 [Tiger 900 GT - LRH]; D34 [Speed Twin Breitling Edition]; D64 [Street Twin Goldline]; DD2 [Speed Twin]; DD4 [Speed Twin]; DP [Street Twin]; DP2 [Street Twin (AT)]; DP3 [Street Twin]; DP4 [Street Twin]; DPA [Street Twin - A2 Licence Version]; DPZ [Speed Twin 900]; HA6 [Daytona Moto2™ 765]; HB6 [Daytona Moto2™ 765]; HD [Street Triple S]; HD2 [Street Triple R]; HD4 [Street Triple S (LAMS)]; HD5 [Street Triple R - LRH]; HD6 [Street Triple RS]; HD7 (do not use - delete if found in use); HDA [Street Triple S - A2 Licence Version]; HE7 [Street Triple S (LAMS)]; HF7 [Street Triple S - A2 Licence Version]; HG7 [Street Triple R]; HG8 [Street Triple R]; HH7 [Street Triple R - LRH]; HJ7 [Street Triple RS]; HJ8 [Street Triple RS]; HK8 [Street Triple Moto2™ Edition]; HL8 [Street Triple Moto2™ Edition]; LG1 [Trident 660]; LL1 [Tiger Sport]; NN3 [Speed Triple S]; NN4 [Speed Triple R]; NN5 [Speed Triple S]; NN6 [Speed Triple RS]; PB1 [Speed Triple 1200 RS]; PJ1 [Speed Triple 1200 RR]; PM1 [Tiger 1200 GT]; PR1 [Tiger 1200 GT Pro]; PX1 [Tiger 1200 GT Explorer]; TD1 [Speed 400]; TH1 [Scrambler 400]; YJ1 [Rocket 3 GT]; YK1 [Rocket 3 R]; YL1 [Rocket 3 TFC]; YM1[Rocket 3 GT]; YN1 [Rocket 3R]
Check the wheel rims for broken or damaged spokes.
Check the wheel hubs for any visible signs of cracks, damage or deformation.
